title: Chapter 73 - Tourism in the Lands of Celestials
body:
Chapter 73 - Tourism in the Lands of Celestials


Yao Si was going to venture into celestials lands. Gu Shucheng had mentioned that they were the most knowledgeable about the control of mental strength, and the Shadow Planet she was heading to specialized in the training of mental strength.


In the past, Yan Xuan had once told her that celestials used their abilities to their fullest potential. They weren’t like the other races that focused on advancing their technology; their strengths lay on a different path.


Celestials used their own abilities in place of technology when they traveled with their swords. Even the ship that Yao Si was coming on was different—it was really a ship.


Indeed, it was exactly like the ancient wooden ships, which was propelled by a blurry figure the celestials called a formation. Despite the ship’s appearance, its speed rivaled the technology-based ones in the Galaxy.


In less than an hour, Yao was reached her destination. She caressed the necklace Mu Xuan had given her. Inside it was a charm with a hint of his mental strength which could be used to influence the perception of others.


Yao Si prepared herself before leaving the ship. She was certain the things outside would be like from some fantasy novel she’d read in the past, totally unlike what she’d seen so far. However, the moment she left the ship, she realized how inadequate her preparations had been.


A woman dressed in an ancient outfit flew over and asked with a bright smile on her face, “Good day, our valuable customer. I’m the attendant that will be at your service during your stay. My identification number is 233. May I know if you’re here to tour or to gain experience?”


Yao Si frozed, caught off-guard by such a retro image, which was a stark contrast to the modern era they lived in. It felt as though she had entered a historical fantasy film.


“Gai-gain experience!”Yao Si replied unnaturally.


“I see.” Attendant 233’s welcoming smile did not waver. “All right, please give me a moment, your personal VIP seat will be brought over right away. It’ll punctually deliver you to your destination .” With a wave, the aide plucked a cloud from the side.


This is too much to handle!


This region was completely different from the rest. It was entirely white, and the surroundings were filled with celestial energy. At times, you could catch a hint of ancient-looking architecture among the flowing marshmallow-like clouds. The majority of the clouds were white, but some possessed other colors. The cloud attendant 233 plucked was a rainbow one.


“Take a seat.”


“Al-alright!”


Yao Si reached out for a touch and found that it was rather soft, quite similar to the transparent children seat she had sat on in the past.


Once she was seated, attendant 233 started to move about, bringing a bunch of documents over and explaining the culture and background of the celestial race.


“Missus, this must be the first time you entered the lands of the celestials, am I right? Let me tell you, our lands are extremely beautiful. There is a total of 811 planets, each with such heavenly views I swear you’ll never want to leave. Others aside, take a look at the Immortal Planet, it’s the third planet and is filled with various unique sights that have not been tainted by mankind. Moreover, they’re having a promotion at the moment, with the group price of just 998 galactic currency. If you’re interested, I could offer up additional offers.”


“…”


Yao Si’s expression froze. How could such a spiritual celestial introduce a tour package in such a way?! “Do celestials prioritize tourism over gaining experience?”
